name: Energi Norge (Energy Norway)
membership: Energy Norway is a member of Eurelectric and also participate in parts of Business Europes activity
goal: Energy Norway is an association with Norwegian Energy Companies (generation, network, supply) as members. Goals are to promote framework conditions for members and promote the use of renewables.Also an employers association.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy Union, Market (wholesale and retails), infrastructure , All Climate and Energy policy issues
